segments.text: Good afternoon , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have booked a table for 3 this evening . I would like to cancel it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Brown and we have reserved a table next to the door .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I see . We will cancel your order .
segments.speaker: S1
